meanings.definition: A brown coloration of the skin caused by exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: After a day at the beach, she had a noticeable suntan on her arms.
meanings.sent2: His suntan made him look like he had been on vacation for weeks.
meanings.sent3: The suntan on his face made him resemble a toasted marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: Her suntan was like a badge of honor from enjoying the sunny weather.
meanings.sent5: The suntan on her skin was a reminder of the fun day spent outdoors.

meanings.definition: To become brown from exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: She will suntan by the pool to get a nice golden glow.
meanings.sent2: If you suntan too long, you might get a sunburn instead.
meanings.sent3: He decided to suntan in the backyard to avoid tan lines.
meanings.sent4: The beachgoers suntan to achieve a bronzed look for summer.
meanings.sent5: They suntan carefully to avoid damaging their skin from the sun.
